svg.text: 2. If the other player can win, block them.

text.font-family: Comic Sans MS, Chalkboard SE, Marker Felt, sans-serif

svg.text: 3. Go in the center square if it's free.

text.font-family: Comic Sans MS, Chalkboard SE, Marker Felt, sans-serif

svg.text: 4. Go in a corner square if one is free.
